script_1.text: The city council has assigned you a dangerous task to investigate the outskirts. Will you accept?

script_2.text: You accept the task. Your supervisor asks if you want to allocate more people to your team.

script_3.text: You refuse the task. Your career in the city guard comes to an abrupt end, and you wonder what might have been.

script_4.text: You head out with your colleagues. Deep in the wasteland, you hear a strange sound and see a faint glow.

options.text: Tell colleagues about what you heard and follow the sound together

script_5.text: You venture out alone. You find strange trails leading into the mist.

script_6.text: You and your colleagues follow the sound and discover a dragon egg. You report it to the City, and it is used as fuel. End of game.

script_7.text: You keep the discovery to yourself. The colleagues seem oblivious.

script_8.text: You decide not to pursue the mystery. Life continues as usual, but the world feels a bit smaller. End of game.

script_9_1.text: Following the trails, you reach a three-way split in the path. Which road will you take?

script_9_2.text: You return at night and find a magical trace. You gain 20 mana from the echo of the trace. A three-way split lies ahead.

script_11.text: You encounter echoesâ€”magical remnants of dead bodies. They are hostile.

options.text: Run away and go back home
Fight the echo with spells and items

script_10.text: Victory! You spent 20 Mana and 2 bullets, but gained 10 mana from the echo using your sorcerer's ring.

options.text: Go back to the split road

script_12.text: You find the Dragon's Nest. The egg pulses with power and offers you a choice.

script_13.text: You return home, safe but forever changed by what you saw. End of game.

script_accept_offer.text: You gain immense power and start your journey out of the city. The world is yours to command. End of game.

script_reject_offer.text: You battle the dragon egg in an epic confrontation. The wasteland shakes from the impact. End of game.
